mapper.select: /* approval-line.findListApprovalLineForReSubmit: 재상신용 결재선 목록 조회 */ SELECT '' AS APVLLN_UUID , '' AS APVL_UUID , USR_ID AS USR_ID , APVLLN_TYP_CCD AS APVLLN_TYP_CCD , LAST_APVR_YN AS LAST_APVR_YN , CASE WHEN APVR_TYP_CCD = 'DFT' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CURR_APVR_YN , APVR_TYP_CCD AS APVR_TYP_CCD , SEQ_PARLL_TYP_CCD AS SEQ_PARLL_TYP_CCD , APVR_DEPT_NM AS APVR_DEPT_NM , APVR_JOBTIT_NM AS APVR_JOBTIT_NM , 'WTG' AS APVLLN_APVL_RES_CCD , APVLLN_SORT AS APVLLN_SORT , 'C' AS STS , APVLLN_MOD_POSS_YN AS APVLLN_MOD_POSS_YN , SEQ_PARLL_TYP_CCD FROM APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS WHERE TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND APVL_UUID = #{p.apvl_uuid} AND STS != 'D' ORDER BY APVLLN_SORT ASC

/* approval-line.findListApprovalLineByApprovalLineSortOrd: 결재선 목록 조회 정렬기준 조회*/ SELECT LN.TEN_ID , LN.APVLLN_UUID , LN.APVL_UUID , LN.USR_ID , LN.APVLLN_TYP_CCD , LN.LAST_APVR_YN , LN.CURR_APVR_YN , LN.APVR_TYP_CCD , LN.APVR_DEPT_NM , LN.APVR_JOBTIT_NM , LN.APVLLN_APVL_RES_CCD , LN.APVL_OPN , LN.APVLLN_SORT , LN.STS , LN.APVLLN_MOD_POSS_YN , LN.APVL_DTTM , LN.REGR_ID , LN.REG_DTTM , LN.MODR_ID , LN.MOD_DTTM , US.USR_NM , LN.SEQ_PARLL_TYP_CCD , US.EML FROM APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS LN INNER JOIN USR US ON LN.TEN_ID = US.TEN_ID AND LN.USR_ID = US.USR_ID WHERE LN.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND LN.APVL_UUID = #{p.apvl_uuid} AND LN.APVLLN_SORT = #{p.apvlln_sort} AND LN.STS != 'D' ORDER BY LN.APVLLN_SORT ASC

/* approval-line.findInfoDeputyApprovalUserInfo : 대리결재자 정보 조회 */ SELECT USR.USR_NM , DEPT.DEPT_NM , (SELECT DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD_NM FROM DTLCD_MULTLANG DTLCD_MULTLANG WHERE DTLCD_MULTLANG.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.CCD = 'C005' AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD = USR.POSI_CCD AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} ) AS POSI_NM FROM USR USR LEFT OUTER JOIN LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG ODM ON USR.TEN_ID = ODM.TEN_ID AND USR.CO_CD = ODM.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND USR.DEPT_CD = ODM.DEPT_CD AND ODM.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD = 'COMPANY' LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT DEPT ON USR.TEN_ID = DEPT.TEN_ID AND ODM.DEPT_CD = DEPT.DEPT_CD AND DEPT.STS != 'D' WHERE USR.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND USR.USR_ID = (SELECT DPTY_APVL.DPTY_APVR_ID FROM DPTY_APVL DPTY_APVL WHERE DPTY_APVL.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND DPTY_APVL.DPTY_APVL_UUID = #{p.dpty_apvl_uuid} AND STS != 'D' )
